targets.expr: clamp_max(((avg by (mode) ( (clamp_max(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$instance",mode!="idle"}[$interval]),1)) or (clamp_max(irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$instance",mode!="idle"}[5m]),1)) ))*100 or (avg_over_time(node_cpu_seconds_total_average{instance=~"$instance", mode!="total", mode!="idle"}[$interval]) or avg_over_time(node_cpu_seconds_total_average{instance=~"$instance", mode!="total", mode!="idle"}[5m]))),100)

sum((rate(node_disk_read_time_seconds_total{device!~"dm-.+", instance="$instance"}[$interval]) / rate(node_disk_reads_completed_total{device!~"dm-.+", instance="$instance"}[$interval])) or (irate(node_disk_read_time_seconds_total{device!~"dm-.+", instance="$instance"}[5m]) / irate(node_disk_reads_completed_total{device!~"dm-.+", instance="$instance"}[5m]))
or avg_over_time(aws_rds_read_latency_average{instance="$instance"}[$interval]) or avg_over_time(aws_rds_read_latency_average{instance="$instance"}[5m]))

sum((rate(node_disk_write_time_seconds_total{device!~"dm-.+", instance="$instance"}[$interval]) / rate(node_disk_writes_completed_total{device!~"dm-.+", instance="$instance"}[$interval])) or (irate(node_disk_write_time_seconds_total{device!~"dm-.+", instance="$instance"}[5m]) / irate(node_disk_writes_completed_total{device!~"dm-.+", instance="$instance"}[5m])) or 
avg_over_time(aws_rds_write_latency_average{instance="$instance"}[$interval]) or avg_over_time(aws_rds_write_latency_average{instance="$instance"}[5m]))
